data.title: Cornerstone Pedals Gladio SC Dumble Pre Amp Overdrive Effects Pedal
data.text:
Gladio SC

Â£229.00

Highlights

Dumble inspired pre amp and overdrive pedal delivers authentic, versatile guitar tones in a compact design

Delivers warm, harmonically rich tones with versatile blending capabilities for dynamic tones

Offers intuitive controls, touch sensitive response, and versatile blending for a dynamic playing experience

Wide ranging EQ control to sculpt frequencies and achieve desired tones

Unique Clean knob seamlessly blends clean and overdriven tones for diverse textures

Two compression levels offer personalised playing feel and dynamics

Meticulously crafted Dumble inspired preamp circuit

Exemplifies Italian craftsmanship with meticulous hand built construction for reliable, premium performance

Features a robust all metal enclosure, ensuring durable protection and space saving pedalboard integration

Showcases historical Italian graphics and font, adding heritage and style to your pedalboard

Features an LED power indicator for convenient onstage visibility

Features true bypass for transparent signal routing and optimum tone preservation

Top mounted jacks and DC input for space saving pedalboard integration

Rest assured with a robust two year warranty for added peace of mind

Description

Meet the Cornerstone Music Gear Gladio SC, a pre amp and overdrive pedal that not only delivers exceptional guitar tones but also invites you to explore new sonic territories. Crafted with precision in Italy, this pedal is a testament to quality craftsmanship and attention to detail.

What sets the Cornerstone Music Gear Gladio SC apart is its ability to produce a wide range of tones, from pristine cleans to creamy overdrive. The Clean knob and compression toggle switch allow you to finely tune your sound, giving you the warmth and richness typically associated with high end amplifiers like the Dumble.

But what truly makes the Cornerstone Music Gear Gladio SC shine is its tone. Picture warm, velvety cleans that sparkle with clarity, or smooth overdriven tones that sing with sustain and harmonic richness. Whether you're playing intricate solos or laying down thick rhythm tracks, the Gladio SC delivers a tone that's as dynamic as it is versatile.

And it doesn't stop there. The Cornerstone Music Gear Gladio SC is equally at home when stacked with other pedals or used as an always on tone enhancer. Its seamless integration into your setup allows you to explore new sonic landscapes and push the boundaries of your creativity.

Compact and elegantly designed, the Cornerstone Music Gear Gladio SC is a welcome addition to any pedalboard. Its sleek aluminium finish nods to its Italian heritage, while its top mounted jacks and compact size make it perfect for even the smallest of setups.

So, whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, the Cornerstone Music Gear Gladio SC is here to help you achieve your musical goals. Experience the difference for yourself and unlock a world of tone with the Gladio SC.

Controls

FOOTSWITCH: Easily power the Gladio SC on and off with a simple tap

VOLUME: Dial in your desired signal output for the perfect volume

GAIN: Customise your level of overdrive and saturation to suit your style

TONE: Fine tune frequencies to sculpt your ideal tone effortlessly

CLEAN: Blend your clean guitar signal seamlessly with the Gladio SC circuit

COMP TOGGLE: Choose between two levels of compression for a personalised playing experience

Components and Technical Specifications

Meticulously constructed with premium materials to deliver unmatched sound quality and dependability

9V centre negative compatibility

Battery operation is not supported

Current Consumption meter readings (mA) by Truetone:

16 mA bypass

43 mA maximum engaged

Enclosure Dimensions

Depth: 120 mm / 4.7 in

Width: 65 mm / 2.5 in

Height : 39 mm / 1.6 in

Weight

269 g

0.59 lbs
